message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a premium price of $18,000. I believe it holds significant value and will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe it's a bit steep at $18,000

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However,  $18,000 is my initial asking price. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $14,000. I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,500
